page.title: 04ENGINEERING PATTERN MAKERS
page.content: This factory was founded in 1947 by {Mr Cross}and{Mr Sansam.}They make patterns for any{three dimensinal {shapes in wood,metal or plastic. They receive designs from customers, then produce a wooden pattern to send to a{foundry}for making{castings. The industry is dependant on the {skills of the workforce}using a range of{hand tools}together with jigsaws, grinders, sanders etc.{Thirty five people work there. They have forty machines. They work between thirty nine and forty six hours a week. They never work at night. Job satisfaction is very high and men very rarely leave. { Cross and Sansam's}are one of the few pattern makers of their type in the country.
